name: Custom Photo Watch Backward Watch - The Past Memories
point1: This item requires 2-4 business days to handcraft.
point2: This item cannot be returned unless it is defective or damaged.
point3: This item is covered by our 90-DAY RETURN policy.
des: Year after year, time goes on and on. Even in old age, I still remember your childlike appearance. Carry your love, with one of our memorial watches. You may not be able to turn back the hands of time but this watch makes us think we can stay together.Upload two photos, young and old, becomes an eternal contrast and memory. Customize a special gift for the elderly.This is a magical and interesting watch.The pointer are backward.Counter clockwise pointer for people who like to be a bit different!Water Resistant, anti-freezing, anti-wear. and tightly sealed dial guarantees that your photo will not fade for 10 years.Easy customization, make your photo watch in minutes.
